physical_examinations.vital_signs: CD4 count: 90 cells/mm3; Viral load: 366,000 copies/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient appeared well nourished; cognitive functions intact; normal muscle bulk; moderately increased tone in both lower extremities with pathologically brisk reflexes and bilateral extensor plantar responses; muscle strength in lower extremities graded 3/5 on the right side and 4/5 on the left side; vibration sense decreased at the ankles.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After 8 weeks on HAART, CD4 count increased to 500 cells/mm3; viral load decreased to 1.6 thousand copies/mL; muscle strength improved to 5/5 in both legs; able to ambulate without assistance; autonomic symptoms resolved.
